content: We run the multi faucet site Dutchycorp without any problems. With the activation of the Terra Classic (LUNC) burning mechanism, we decided to support this activity on our website.Within the scope of the activity plan; Those who want to send their balance to the burning address for Terra Classic (LUNC) will be able to perform this transaction without a lower payment limit.LUNC will be purchased from the market with 25% of the monthly advertising revenues and sent to the burning address.We are planning to start this activity as of October. We will not say “no” to anyone who wants to support when the transactions in question are costly. If it is more than the amount of support, we will increase the amount of burn.Together "Support LUNC"Terra Classic (LUNC) and Terra Classic USD Address: terra1fg9tufkq2rrkgzx4h0gyn3hwdewhn3a2ye2wzy
